=== About me ===
My name is Adnane Belmadiaf. I'm a Web developer from <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sal%C3%A9|Sal√©]]</nowiki>, Morocco.  I've started using Ubuntu from Feisty Fawn with Dual Boot, then i totally switched to Ubuntu with the Jaunty Jackalope. I am involved in different projects in the Ubuntu community.

=== IRC channels ===
You can find me on Freenode on the following channels
 {*} #ubuntu-ma (Ubuntu Moroccan users)                                                        <<BR>>
 {*} #ubuntu-locoteams                                                       <<BR>> 
 {*} #ubuntu-manual (Ubuntu Manual)                                                       <<BR>>

=== Contributions ===
==== The Ubuntu Manual Project ====
I am the developer & the maintainer of the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-manual.org|Ubuntu Manual Website]]</nowiki> (<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-manual-website|on Launchpad]]</nowiki>) , <nowiki>[[http://planet.ubuntu-manual.org|Ubuntu Manual Planet]]</nowiki> (<nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~ubuntu-manual-website/+junk/ump-planet-theme|on Launchpad]]</nowiki>).
* <nowiki>[[http://test.ubuntu-manual.org|The new Website]]</nowiki> .
==== Operation Cleansweep Countdown ====
I helped the <nowiki>[[..-ReviewersTeam|Ubuntu Reviewers Team]]</nowiki> to design a countdown widget that help to view the progress of the <nowiki>[[..-OperationCleansweep|Operation Cleansweep]]</nowiki> (<nowiki>[[http://daniel.holba.ch/review/example.html|See an example]]</nowiki>).
==== Loco Directory ====
I work as a <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com|Loco Directory]]</nowiki> hacker, i implemented (and still implementing) new features (such as the photo feeds from picasa, flickr & pix.ie in both Global events and Teams profiles) & fixing bugs  (<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/loco-directory|on Launchpad]]</nowiki>).
==== Loco Directory API Wrappers ====
I started this project with <nowiki>[[..-mhall119|mhall119]]</nowiki>, so basically it aims to provide wrappers to the Loco Directory API in several programming languages (<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/loco-directory-clients|on Launchpad]]</nowiki>).
==== Ubuntu Server Map ====
I worked with <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~kim0|Ahmed Kamal]]</nowiki> from the Canonical Community Team on implementing a theme with the new Brand for the <nowiki>[[http://maps.ubuntu.com/|Ubuntu Server Map]]</nowiki> (<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/mapuntu|on Launchpad]]</nowiki>).
==== Ubuntu Cloud Portal ====
During the last few months I have working with <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~kim0|Ahmed Kamal]]</nowiki> on creating on new portal for the Ubuntu Cloud community, now the portal is ready and waiting to be deployed.
==== Others ====
* <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/~adnane002/+activity|Translations]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/CommunityReview/Sep2010/Advocacy#Name Adnane Belmadiaf (daker)|Community Review]]</nowiki>
* Fixed <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/632770|bug 632770]]</nowiki> on the Software Center.
* Interviewed by Ahmed Kamal ( <nowiki>[[http://goo.gl/E1UQn|Link]]</nowiki> )

=== Plans ===
* Creating the second version for the Ubuntu Cloud Portal for the 11.04 release (mockups http://ubuntuone.com/p/Lmx/ http://ubuntuone.com/p/Lmw/ http://ubuntuone.com/p/Ln2/).
* We are working (as <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~art-design-website|Art Design Website Developers ]]</nowiki>) on a new project which is a website used to submit art and design, it will be hosted on art.ubuntu.com once finish (<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/erato|on Launchpad]]</nowiki>).
